description: ERECTION OF STAINED TIMBER FENCING ON FRONTAGE OF SITE INVOLVING REMOVAL OF EXISTING METAL RAILINGS AND RAISING EXISTING BRICKWORK TO 0.75M, TOGETHER WITH ERECTION OF REPLACEMENT PLYWOOD CLAD TUBULAR METAL GATES TO GIVE OVERALL HEIGHT OF 2M.
decision_conditions: Condition : 4 - Informative: Your attention is drawn to the deteriorating condition and poor visual appearance of the adjoining building and you are urged to take early steps to renovate and restore the building to a satisfactory condition.

Condition : 6 - The proposed fencing by reason of its design, siting and appearance would represent an inappropriate form of enclosure to this prominent frontage site detrimental to the visual amenities of this predominantly residential area, and would be likely to restrict visibility for vehicles emerging from the car park to the detriment of vehicular and pedestrian safety, contrary to policies EB.23, M.11 and M.12 of the Adopted Unitary Development Plan, April 1996.
